snippet.title: Townsmen VR - Announce Trailer | PS VR2 Games
snippet.description:
Build a medieval village within a completely interactively simulated world!

Townsmen VR uses the exciting possibilities of virtual reality to further enhance the classic city-building game with entirely new gameplay experiences and interactive mechanics.

Lean back, relax and watch the bustling life of your villagers, or actively get involved to speed up processes and move workers and resources directly where they are needed. You can seamlessly change between the all-encompassing view of a god and the detailed view of a citizen, able to follow the colorful life of your village. There is a lot to discover! But watch out for the Black Knight’s plundering hordes!

#psvr2 #psvr2
